TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BuildStartedEventHandler(object sender, BuildStartedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed BuildStartedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStartedEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.BuildStarted"> event of a build.
